::Aerotaur::
    He wrapped his wings around him to block the two incoming 
missiles.  After they detonated he threw his wings back, only to 
discover that they had fused.  "Well that's just not good."  He fell 
to the ground and landed in a crouch.  His wings hurt an increddiable 
amount but he stood and thrust his arms between the feathers and 
accurately fired 8 powerful shots.
